divs: sighting detailsmy sister and i were driving home around 1:30 a.m. on friday\saturday, 7\13\12 on hwy 151 north, just passing hunt lane when we both noticed a bright light, like a yellowish star hovering about 100 ft up and to the right of us. suddenly, the light shot down in a diagonal path and disappeared. aside from the fact that it was hovering before it shot off, we thought maybe it was a shooting star.
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around July 14th 2012
